wiki.content:
Written by Kurt Cobain after he spent an entire day listening to "Meet the Beatles", the title of this song came after Bleach producer Jack Endino asked what it was about and Cobain replied "It's about a girl". 
 
 This track is often said to be the first hint of the more pop-oriented songwriting that would become prominent on Nevermind, and stood in stark contrast to the more hardcore punk influenced sound of the rest of the Bleach album.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Written by Kurt Cobain after he spent an entire day listening to "Meet the Beatles", the title of this song came after Bleach producer Jack Endino asked what it was about and Cobain replied "It's about a girl".   This track is often said to be the first hint of the more pop-oriented songwriting that would become prominent on Nevermind, and stood in stark contrast to the more hardcore punk influenced sound of the rest of the Bleach album.

track.name: About a Girl
comments: last.fm just played a commercial after just three songs...thank god this song came on, seriously? THREE SONGS?!
One of my favorites by them.
Remember when Nirvana first hit the UK? Christ alive, they were needed - the end of the 80s / early 90s was looking dire until this lot emerged. Thank heavens for them...
Nossa!!!parabéns para a pessoa que postou esta versão pesadona e suja de About a Girl,está ruim de ouvir mas ainda é uma das minhas favoritas.
Anthony Raneiri sings this song better :)
''What's the name of it,Kurt?'' ''This song is about a girl.''
